attributes.action: Dog Fighting is Wrong and People  Don't Get Punished Enough
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we want any form of dog fighting stopped.owners of animals suffering this tourment when caught should have a prison scentence,hefty fine and a ban from keeping any animals for life.all dogs must be chipped with the ownners name and address along with date of registration. this information would be kept on a database ran by the r.s.p.c.a.police officers would be able to stop any owner in the street and scan the animal for correct information,if the animal is not chipped the police will issue a fine which could be let off if you have your animal chipped within 14 days.this should not be an option but the law!! if you sign this petitiion you could be the voices for the animals,that unfortunatly died from this or suffering.
